name: Morals Are Optional
tagline: Cards Against Humanity clone created using LibGDX and More Controllers Please
body:
## Overview.
**Morals Are Optional** is a digital version of the card game ["Cards Against Humanity"](http://cardsagainsthumanity.com/) written using [LibGDX](https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx) and [More Controllers Please](https://github.com/witnessmenow/MoreControllersPlease). The webpages are written with jQuery. Currently the application runs on desktop (Win/Mac/Linux) and android.

## How It Works.
One device runs the app, all other devices connect to the game using the devices web browser.

![Game Play](http://i.imgur.com/fFr8rbw.png)

In this example the game is running on a tablet. Brian, Billy and Bob have all typed in the displayed address into their phones' browser. As they are only connecting via a browser, any device can be used (Android, Apple, Blackberry, Windows etc)
